item.title: Pothole on Stoke Orchard Road, 31st January
item.description:
On exiting the roundabout going on to Stoke Orchard Road, a previous repair is disintegrating right across the left side of the road a few metres before the entrance to Lyndley Chase. Appears to be worsening. Risk of damage to cars and potentially dangerous for cyclists and motorcyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
